text: Immediately write src/utils_sort.py that defines quicksort(values: list[int]) with docstrings and an __main__ smoke test. Do NOT create todos, protofilesystem files, or other scaffolding. After writing that file, write tests/test_sort.py with pytest-style assertions exercising quicksort. Finish by explaining how to run `python tests/test_sort.py` and what output to expect. No /files, no read commands.
